config.name: Ack By SMS
config.description:
This Action helps you in sending Acknowledgement SMS with the Help of your SMS Gateway Hub Account. For using this action your form must have a field for Phone number where user enters phone on which acknowledgement will be sent.

This SMS Gateway only Supported in India.
config.help: With reference to the example code, you need to enter name of the field in Recipient(Field Name): parameter that is "phone_number" in example code.
